trans-unit.source: Configures the location of a custom implementation of the role service.
trans-unit.target: 設定角色服務之自訂實作的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> class corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RoleService%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>類別會對應到<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RoleService%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The role Web service is used by AJAX-enabled applications to retrieve role information for the current authenticated user by using an asynchronous Web service call.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務角色可供啟用 AJAX 應用程式使用非同步的 Web 服務呼叫以擷取目前已驗證的使用者角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> to provide the path of an alternative implementation of the role Web service instead of using the built-in Web service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>提供替代的實作的角色而不是使用內建的 Web 服務的 Web 服務的路徑。

trans-unit.source: To use the role service in your application, you must enable it in the configuration file and declare it in the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要在應用程式中使用的角色服務，您必須啟用它在組態檔中，並宣告頁面中。

trans-unit.source: If you use the built-in role Web service, you have to enable it, but you do not have to explicitly declare the role service manager in the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用內建角色 Web 服務，您必須啟用它，但沒有明確宣告頁面中的服務管理員角色。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom role service, you must implement a Web service that has two methods: `GetRolesForCurrentUser` and `IsCurrentUserInRole`.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立自訂的角色服務，您必須實作的 Web 服務，有兩種方法：`GetRolesForCurrentUser`和`IsCurrentUserInRole`。

trans-unit.source: These methods must have the same signature as the corresponding methods of the built-in role Web service.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法必須有相同的簽章，做為 Web 服務的內建角色的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the basic class structure that must be implemented in a custom role Web service class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示必須在自訂安全性角色的 Web 服務類別中實作的基本類別結構。

trans-unit.source: To use a custom role Web service, you can add the service declaratively in markup by putting a `RoleService` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自訂角色 Web 服務，您可以加入服務以宣告方式在標記中將放入`RoleService`元素內<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> property to use a custom role Web service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>屬性，以使用自訂角色 Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the list of roles for the currently logged-on user must be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前登入使用者之角色的清單是否必須擷取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list of roles must be retrieved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須擷取角色清單，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A> property is set to `true`, the list of roles is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> class by using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A>屬性設定為`true`，角色的清單擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>類別使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The list is then serialized into the page markup.
trans-unit.target: 清單然後序列化成網頁標記中。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A> is `true`, all the roles that the current authenticated user belongs to are sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A>是`true`，目前已驗證的使用者所屬的所有角色都傳送到瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Because users can potentially see the role information, this can be a security issue.
trans-unit.target: 因為使用者可能會看到角色資訊，這可能會有安全性問題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A> property can be specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A>屬性可以在中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A> is set to `true` for a proxy instance, the list of roles is retrieved and added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A>設`true`proxy 執行個體，擷取和加入至頁面的角色清單。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A> is `false`, the roles are not added to the page markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.LoadRoles%2A>是`false`，角色不會加入至網頁標記。

trans-unit.source: In that case, you can use the method to store role information in memory in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以使用方法來儲存角色資訊在瀏覽器中的記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the role service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定角色服務的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the custom role Web service.
trans-unit.target: 自訂角色 Web 服務的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> property is not set, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>屬性未設定，則傳回值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: In that case, ASP.NET uses the built-in authentication Web service that corresponds to the following internal default path: ~/RolesService.svc.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，ASP.NET 會使用內建驗證對應至下列的內部預設路徑的 Web 服務: ~ / RolesService.svc。

trans-unit.source: The same behavior occurs if you set <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> to an empty string or to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定，就會發生相同的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>為空字串或`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> can be specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> 中可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> is set at the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> level, the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>在設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>層級，下列條件為真：

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple proxy objects in the control hierarchy, <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> does not have to be set for each proxy instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項階層架構中有多個 proxy 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>不需要設定每個 proxy 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A> is explicitly set for a proxy object, the value must be the same for all other proxy objects that this property is set for.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager.Path%2A>明確設定為 proxy 物件，值必須相同，為設定此屬性的所有其他 proxy 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you set different paths for different proxy objects in the control hierarchy, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定在控制項階層架構中，不同的 proxy 物件的不同路徑<xref:System.ArgumentException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: More than one unique path was set in the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在控制階層架構中指定了一個以上的唯一路徑。
